item.title: EP 249 - Is Cannabis From Outer Space?
item.itunes:title: Is Cannabis From Outer Space?
item.description:
Today we sit back, light one up, and discuss if weed is from outer space!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Marijuana's History: How One Plant Spread Through the World

https://www.livescience.com/48337-marijuana-history-how-cannabis-travelled-world.html

 

Nommo

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nommo

 

Sacred Sites of the Dogon, Mali

https://sacredsites.com/africa/mali/dogon.html

 

Tengriism

https://www.newworldencyclopedia.org/entry/Tengriism

 

10,000 Years: An Etymologically Guided History of Cannabis

https://www.academia.edu/3578385/10_000_Years_An_Etymologically_Guided_History_of_Cannabis

 

The Dogon, the Nommos and Sirius B

http://www.unmuseum.org/siriusb.htm

 

 

Black people according to Herodotus

https://abagond.wordpress.com/2015/02/20/black-people-according-to-herodotus/

 

The Two Dog Plant

http://www.spiralout.org/the-two-dog-plant

 

The Origin Of Cannabis?

https://www.unexplained-mysteries.com/forum/topic/89689-the-origin-of-cannabis/

 

HERODOTUS [The Greek Historian] 490 - 425-BC

http://antiquecannabisbook.com/chap2B/Greco_Roman/Herodotus.htm

 

Sirius

https://www.britannica.com/place/Sirius-star

 

Original Source Of Marijuana Was Brought To Earth By "The Gods"

https://lightgrid.ning.com/profiles/blogs/original-source-of-marijuana-was-brought-to-earth-by-the-gods

 

Marijuana's History: How One Plant Spread Through the World

https://www.livescience.com/48337-marijuana-history-how-cannabis-travelled-world.html

 

The Dogon, the Nommos and Sirius B

http://www.unmuseum.org/siriusb.htm

 

Dogon and Sirius

http://www.skepdic.com/dogon.html

 

Legends of the Dogon

https://www.skeptic.com/eskeptic/10-01-13/

 

The Sirius Mystery

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Sirius_Mystery

 

In Search of... (TV series)

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/In_Search_of..._(TV_series)
